title: Regles:Zero E-zine
content:
Hello Folks

i've restarted the Règles:Zéro e-zine project.  
this morning i quickly put a new page for last issues download here : [http://www.regleszero.fr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015020015/http:/www.regleszero.fr/ "http://www.regleszero.fr")

the dot com was down for a while, shoted in the back by advertisers :(

The 3rd issue is on the way, and the theme will be generative artworks (processing, flash, vvvv, ...) and what they do with types and letter shapes.

i'm also looking for contributors and present some fresh new alphabets, feel free to contact me : shadeone(at)gmail(dot)com if you have something to submit

cheers

---S
author: shadeone

comments.content:
thanks luce ;)

i hope you will submit some of your sweet types !
